title: Help!!!
content:
Please help me to choose between this (through kcet) 
I am very much confused whether I should opt cse in round 1 or wait till extended round

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/1f5ezdo)

comments.body: Come on sir, tell ur future gaols of any like if masters then choose CSE only or placements then any will be good
My only focus is on placements
Can take the main campus then :)
no reason to choose ai ml over cse
nahh bro take cse, if placements is ur only aim, u will have common placements with rr from ecc too, taking cse without spec makes more sense.
You're in same situation as I am lol. I'm thinking to Join cse in Pes EC Campus. I think it's better choice. Tell me what you think
Cse at ec would be better
